SELECT API_ID , API_NM , API_URL , API_TXT
, USE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM , REG_USR_ID , TO_CHAR(REG_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DTM FROM API1000 WHERE 1=1 AND LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId#
AND UPPER( API_NM ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND USE_CD = #searchCd#
